name: Way of the Astral Self
description: These monks manifest a spiritual astral form to extend their presence and might.

3.name: Arms of the Astral Self
3.description: As a bonus action, spend 1 ki point to summon spectral arms that deal force damage, extend your reach by 5 feet, and allow the use of Wisdom for Strength checks and attacks for 10 minutes.

6.name: Visage of the Astral Self
6.description: Summon a spectral visage for 10 minutes, granting 120-foot darkvision, advantage on Insight and Intimidation, and the ability to speak to one creature or amplify your voice.

11.name: Body of the Astral Self
11.description: While both arms and visage are present, a spectral body grants damage reduction against certain types and lets your arms deal extra damage once per turn.

17.name: Awakened Astral Self
17.description: Spend 5 ki points to fully manifest your astral self for 10 minutes, gaining +2 AC and attacking three times with astral arms when you use Extra Attack.
